Moo::TextureExposer

Moo::TextureExposer Class Reference

This class locks a DX texture and caches information for a given LOD level. More...

Detailed Description

This class locks a DX texture and caches information for a given LOD level.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Selects lod level 0.

bool Moo::TextureExposer::level ( int  lod  ) 

Switch to the given lod level.

Returns true on success, false on failure. Failure can be due to nonexistent texture, nonexistent surface for given level, or failure to lock that level's surface.
